DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 / QUARTERFINALS ; SPOTLIGHT ; DEFINING MOMENT
DOC.TEXT: A Financial Times reader came_up with the observation that there are four main types of football-oriented games : British Assn . football : a game for gentlemen played by hooligans . Rugby Union football : a game for hooligans played by gentlemen . Rugby League football : a game for hooligans played by hooligans . American_football : a game for Americans played by Americans .
